::Dachande/Battera/Vukodlak::

    Dachande and Battera were summoned to th=
e Destron base, the Sulaco. "Vulois, we have been summoned, I cannot refuse=
 this, I will attempt to make Magma let his bond to me go, but I doubt it w=
ill work."
    Battera and Dachande left, on the way, Battera, and Battera =
only was sucked under the earth. Dachande was in a frantic, he was blasting=
 at the ground with all of his weapons, but it did no good. He couldn't get=
 her, so he used his spear to try and dig, needless to say he wasn't sucess=
ful.

    Battera fell into the cave of Vukodlak. She caught herself on her=
 wings, and coasted to the ground. Unfortunatly her will was not as strong =
as others, she could not resist Vukodlak's lure, there was not even any res=
istance. She went and partook of his mech fluid. It gave her enhanced abili=
ties, and made her somewhat eviler. She then burst from the ground ten feet=
 from Dachande, and took off without Dachande, he went to beast mode, as it=
 were his faster form of travel, but he was still losing yards to her.
